Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.domain

Class AbstractChap

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.domain.AbstractChap
Direct Known Subclasses:
RegularChap, VariantChap
public abstract class AbstractChap
extends java.lang.Object
An Actor is a game character that moves around, like Chap, the hero of the game. Variants are added in level 2 that interacts with Chap (ie, by killing Chap). Unlike Chap, Variants will move around on their own (in the same direction as long as there's a freetile in fron of them, if not it would turn clockwise until it sees a freetile), and are not directed by user input. Must use IllegalArgumentException and IllegalStateException to enforce preconditions, and Java asserts for postconditions checks.
Author:
Victor Tam
